### 1
## 정규분포 pdf 값을 계산하는 자신만의 Python 함수를 정의하고 정규분포 mu = 3, sigma = 2의 pdf를 그릴 것

::: {#ceb08aa7 .cell execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
from scipy.stats import bernoulli
from scipy.stats import binom
import seaborn as sns
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np
import math
from scipy.stats import norm

def my_norm(x, loc, scale):
  result = []
  for i in range(len(x)):
    result.append((1 / (scale * math.sqrt(2 * math.pi))) * 
                  math.exp(-1 / 2 * (((x[i] - loc) / scale)**2)))
  return result

plt.clf()
x = np.linspace(-7, 13, 50)
y = my_norm(x, 3, 2)
plt.plot(x, y)
plt.show()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/cell-2-output-1.png){width=587 height=411}
:::
:::


### 2
## Python scipy 패키지 사용해서 다음과 같은 확률을 구하시오 X ~ N(2, 3^2)
## 1) P(X < 3)

::: {#1b8ede3c .cell execution_count=2}
``` {.python .cell-code}
norm.cdf(3, loc = 2, scale = 3)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=12}
```
0.6305586598182363
```
:::
:::


## 2) P(2 < X < 5)

::: {#d9444157 .cell execution_count=3}
``` {.python .cell-code}
norm.cdf(5, 2, 3) - norm.cdf(2, 2, 3)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=13}
```
0.3413447460685429
```
:::
:::


## 3) P(X < 3 or X > 7)

::: {#f7517b92 .cell execution_count=4}
``` {.python .cell-code}
1 - (norm.cdf(7, 2, 3) - norm.cdf(3, 2, 3))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=14}
```
0.678349012091051
```
:::
:::


### 3
## LS 빅데이터 스쿨 학생들의 중간고사 점수는 평균이 30이고, 분산이 4인 정규분포를 따른다. 상위 5%에 해당하는 학생의 점수는?

::: {#88fb7746 .cell execution_count=5}
``` {.python .cell-code}
norm.ppf(0.95, loc = 30, scale = 2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=15}
```
33.28970725390295
```
:::
:::
